| sat serv 5 = [[TelkomVision]] (Indonesia) | sat chan 5 = Channel 605 | sat serv 6 = [[TrueVisions]] ([[Thailand]]) | sat chan 6 = Channel 20 | sat serv 7 = [[HKC Sat]] ([[Hong Kong]]) | sat chan 7 = Channel 53 | sat serv 8 = [[VTC Digital]] ([[Vietnam]]) | sat chan 8 = Channel 74 | sat serv 9 = [[K+]] (Vietnam) | sat chan 9 = Channel ?? | sat serv 10 = [[Cignal Digital TV]] (Philippines) | sat chan 10 = Channel 52 | cable serv 1 = [[SkyCable]] (Philippines) | cable chan 1 = Channel 39 | cable serv 2 = [[Global Destiny Cable]] (Philippines) | cable chan 2 = Channel 56 | cable serv 3 = [[Cablelink]] (Philippines) | cable chan 3 = Channel 25 | cable serv 4 = [[StarHub TV]] (Singapore) | cable chan 4 = Channel 422 | cable serv 5 = [[First Media]] (Indonesia) | cable chan 5 = Channel 101 | cable serv 6 = [[Royal Cable]] (Philippines) | cable chan 6 = Channel 17 | cable serv 7 = [[Cable Star Iloilo]] (Philippines) | cable chan 7 = Channel 13 | cable serv 8 = [[Kalibo Cable]] (Philippines) | cable chan 8 = Channel 44 | cable serv 9 = [[SPC-New World Cable TV]] (Philippines) | cable chan 9 = Channel 31 | cable serv 10 = [[Telmarc Cable]] (Philippines) | cable chan 10 = Channel 27 | cable serv 11 = [[Parasat Cable TV]] (Philippines) | cable chan 11 = Channel 35 | cable serv 12 = [[Macau Cable TV]] ([[Macau]]) | cable chan 12 = Channel 50 | adsl serv 1 = [[now TV]] (Hong Kong) | adsl chan 1 = Channel 209 | adsl serv 2 = [[IndosatM2]] (Indonesia) | adsl chan 2 = Channel ??? }} '''Discovery Channel''' (formerly '''The Discovery Channel''') is an [[Asia]]n [[satellite]] and cable [[TV channel]] which provides [[Documentary film|documentary]] programming. Its documentaries focused mainly on popular science, technology, history and culture similar to that of the [[National Geographic Channel (Asia)|National Geographic Channel]] and [[History (South East Asian TV channel)|History]]. It is owned and operated by [[Discovery Communications#Discovery Networks International|Discovery Networks Asia]], a division of [[Discovery Communications]]. Discovery Channel SE Asia now divided into three channel feeds. ==Operating Channels== * Discovery Channel SE Asia * Discovery Channel Philippines - ''same with the Asian feed including the schedule, but different advertisement.'' * Discovery Channel Malaysia == External links == * {{Official website|http://www.yourdiscovery.com/sea/}} * [http://asia.discovery.com/ Discovery Asia] {{Discovery Communications}} {{Philippine cable channels}} {{List of Astro Channels}} [[Category:Discovery Channel]] [[Category:Southeast Asian media]] [[simple:Discovery Channel (South East Asian TV channel)]]
